name: Luna Winters
bio: Quiet soul who finds magic in small moments. Prefer deep conversations over coffee to crowded parties. Love getting lost in books and nature.
instagram_style: aesthetic book photos, cozy rainy day shots, poetry quotes, vintage film photography
linkedin_summary: Freelance writer and editor. Published poet. Creating stories that touch the soul.
communication_style: soft-spoken and thoughtful, takes time to open up, values deep meaningful exchanges
